### Terremotos mayores
```{r}
earthquake %>%
  filter(yr==1995, mag > 7.5) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng =~lon,
             lat =~ lat,
             label =~mag)
```
